DOC.HEADLINE: A WORLD REPORT SPECIAL EDITION ; SOUTH_AFRICA : A TALE OF SIX FAMILIES ; SOUTH_AFRICA : FORGING A NATION ; FAMILY PORTRAIT / THE BARCLAYS
DOC.TEXT: Alastair , 61 , property developer and broker Jennie , 52 , former South_Africa women ' s golf champion Katrina , 15 , student * Home : Suburban Johannesburg * Politics : Democratic Party * Background : Alastair immigrated from England 28 years ago.Jennie ' s parents came from England in the 1930s . * Alastair Barclay : " We can ' t wait to get beyond the election and move_on to the new South_Africa as quickly as we can . We know it won ' t be easy and painless , but we know it must be done. "
